item.title: 关于我
item.description: Donny Hyde is a brazen two-column hugo theme based on the Jekyll theme of the same name. It pairs a prominent sidebar with uncomplicated content. Contents Installation Options Sidebar menu Sticky sidebar content Themes Reverse layout Disqus Google Analytics Author Ported by License Installation To install Hyde as your default theme, first install this repository in the themes/ directory: $ cd themes/ $ git clone https://github.
